channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery

item.title: From biting flies to feathered dinosaurs, scientists reveal 70 new species
item.description: Researchers announced over 70 new species in a single year, including bizarre insects, ancient dinosaurs, rare mammals, and deep-river fish. Many were...

item.title: Glowing neurons let scientists watch the brain work in real time

item.title: Scientists found a new way to slow aging inside cells
